teacher_info.intro:
A big 你好 (Nǐ hǎo) to everyone who is reading my profile and interested in learning Chinese language. I am Poona from the mainland of China, I am 30 years old but always feel like 18! Currently I'am living in Istanbul, Turkey (I move around every few months to experience and learn different cultures). I enjoy  books, music, movies, hiking, running, traveling, smiling, yoga and meditation. And I am a good listener and always open to share and learn. 

So tell me your stories:)

Hello, I'm Kelly! I’m from Beijing China. I’ve been teaching Chinese for 4 years. 

3 Promises if you learn Chinese with me
✔ Have Fun by creative interaction with new innovative materials
✔Offering tailored classes
✔A lot of PRACTICE 

4 reasons why I am a great teacher for you
	speak standard Mandarin and I’ve got a certificate in National Mandarin Proficiency Test.
	master degree in Education and International Communication.
	10+years business experience in China. 
	A language learner myself

Now schedule a lesson below and let me help you with your Chinese and achieve your GOALS!!!

大家好，我是Wendy老师，具有3年教学经验的”国际汉语教师资格认证导师”。普通话标准，来自北京。
我目前是在一家外企工作，我的外国同事们都非常喜欢学习汉语，与我聊有关中国的历史，我也会经常给他们纠正发音，用更有意思的方式教他们更准确的使用汉语词汇。

Hello, 你(nǐ)好(hǎo)! I am Helen, an experienced, native speaking teacher of Chinese with both classroom teaching and private tutoring experience in Australia, China and UK. 
I was born and raised in China but have spent many years overseas, studying and working.
I reside in Melbourne, Australia now. 
I am passionate about bridging cultural gaps between Chinese communities and people from other cultural backgrounds.
I look forward to getting to know you and learn and grow with you.

My name is Xiao Qian (English name is Lily). I am Chinese and currently live in Shenzhen, China.
 I have a quieter personality. But when we get to know each other, I'll be more outgoing and cheerful (that's probably what we call a "slow hot personality"). I love to read and play badminton, and also love to travel, having been to Beijing, Shanghai, Chengdu and other places. I like Chengdu, which has a slower pace of life. When I went to the People's Park in Chengdu, a lot of people there to drink tea and chat, sing and dance ~ all live a very peaceful life, the elderly people are also very kind, will affectionately call you "幺妹儿".  This is probably my ideal living situation~haha

My name is Lily and I am a professional Bulgarian, English, Chinese, and Spanish language teacher. My experience with learning languages has made me realize that we all have unlimited potential and ability to master a new language. We just need to find the best method that works for us.
And this is exactly what my mission is about. To show you that learning languages is fun, interesting, and easy.

I am Cindy and I teach Mandarin and Teochew language. I am native Mandarin speaker and grew up in Shantou, China. So I can speak Teochew dialect and Mandarin fluently.

I have experience in teaching beginners and kids before. In my class, you can choose music, movies, textbooks, videos, presentations or articles as your learning material. My class is very flexible, I will make individual plans according to your goals and preference or adjust my lesson content for you based on your language ability. I am very patient and easy-going. Hope you will enjoy my class and gain more learning skills.

Hello,everyone!Here is Andrina who is a native Chinese speaker. Im living in China. I've been teaching mandarin in indonesia in past one year as a Chinese volunteer teacher. 
Im into traveling,swimming and hiking.if you have any problems in traveling in China,i got you.Im also a big fan of barca,so i will be staying up late for watching barca live sometime.
Im out-going and funny girl.Im always patient with students.Let's learn Chinese together:)I believe that we are going to have a good time.
大家好，我是丹丹（dāndān），中文是我的母语。我居住在中国。在过去一年里，我作为汉语教师志愿者在印度尼西亚教汉语。我喜欢旅游、游泳和徒步旅行。我是一名巴萨球迷，有时会为了看直播而熬夜。我是一个外向、有趣的女孩。来加入我的课堂，和我一起学汉语吧！

+ PhD. in Teaching Chinese as a Second Language. 
+ M.A. in Applied Linguistics & TESOL.
+ B.A. in Primary Education, English Literature and German. 
+ I’ve worked as an interpreter and a language teacher. 
+ I did an exchange semester in University Leipzig in Germany. 
+ I've travelled more than 34 countries. 
+ More than 6 years Chinese teaching experience (Taiwan and overseas). 
+ Experience in teaching all levels. 
   Beginners from zero, intermediate and advanced. 
  (Students from kindergartens to university professors)
+ Very patient ,relaxed and open-minded person.

Hello!
My name is Wang Chunli. My English name is Ally. I got my Master Degree in June 2008. I have taught Chinese on italki since 2009. I teach Chinese with New Practical Chinese Reader. I teach business Chinese with the book New Silk Road Business Chinese, and I teach oral Chinese with Short-Term Spoken Chinese. My teaching focuses on oral English.
From August 2017 to July 2019, I worked as a sponsored Chinese teacher in University of Ghana, where I taught college students Chinese grammar, spoken Chinese, Business Chinese, Modern Chinese Literature and Ancient Chinese literature. I also wrote a book for level 300 students, the book is Aspects of Ancient Chinese Literature.

Hi Everyone, this is Jen, 大家好! I have a bachelor degree in Communication majored in English literature and Journalism as well as an Advanced Diploma in Translation (English -- Chinese Mandarin). I am currently completing my postgraduate law degree in Melbourne, Australia. 

Please follow me on social media where I regularly post useful and fun Chinese learning content! 

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/jenniferxszhao/featured?view_as=subscriber
Instagram: learn_chinese_with_jen

Happy learning & Good luck!

Hey, this is Mandy, a native speaker from China. I am a PROFESSIONAL teacher with 3 years experience of teaching Chinese.   

I got an EXCELLENT score in the Putonghua Shuiping Ceshi (94\100) so I can speak standard Mandarin. My major is teaching of Chinese as a second language. I also got a Chinese Teacher Certification. So I have scientific and efficient teaching methods. 

I love to know new friends and love to talk with different people.
If you want to find a Chinese teacher, just feel free to contact me. 
Looking forward to seeing you ：）

Hello, my name is Snow! I am a Chinese teacher, born in Inner Mongolia. My mother gave birth to me in the winter time and on the day I was born there was heavy snowfall. My parents therefore named me:  Xia Xue, I think you must remember my name now! I earned a master’s degree in education from Northeast Normal University with a major in International and Comparative Education. My Mandarin is standard and I am a part-time host in my student time.

I'm a patient and open-minded person. I can speak standard and natural mandarin. In my class you will achieve a lot.My hobbies are traveling, reading and studying deeper about Chinese  culture. I am a big fan of Laozi(老子) and Zhuangzi (庄子), two of the greatest philosopher in China. I'm curious about many topics. Recently, I am taking some online courses on: 1. Artificial Intelligence; 2. Python (Computer Language); 3. Economics of New Structures; 4. World History. So, we can discuss any topics that you are interested in.
I've been traveling and working in foreign countries. I am always excited to communicate with people from all over the world and different backgrounds.

I help students create customized materials for them! We can also have free conversation practices!

⭐Lesson details can be found at each kind of package description!

*Please check out the section of "My Teaching Style" and talk about the content before booking a lesson, so that I can have enough time to customize it for you. 

I'm a native Mandarin speaker from Taiwan and have taught over 2300 Mandarin lessons online the past 3 years, and another over 2 years as EFL teacher at children cram schools in Taiwan.. 

I have multiple learning experiences with different languages, so I know how students feel and their struggles! 
Let's me support you along your Mandarin learning journey:)

专业对外汉语&日语教师，自2012年起从事语言教育，教授过各国学生，授课范围覆盖入门至高级及定制课程，擅长因材施教，根据学生具体情况制定有针对性的学习计划。可用汉语、英语、日语及一点点韩语进行授课。
Professional Chinese & Japanese teacher. Starting teaching from 2012. Experienced with teaching all levels. Good at teaching students according to their aptitude, and helping students  making their our study plan. Able to teach in English, Chinese, Japanese and a little bit Korean.
プロの中国語と日本語教師で、2012年から中国語と日本語の教師として働いています。今までは各国、各レベルの生徒さんに、入門から高級、ビジネス、会話、受験などのコースを全て教えることがあります。

Hi，this is Jen，i love teaching language and enjoy a lot taking classes on internet (i teach for free on social media like ig or yt @chinesewithjen), especially when my student understanding and improving, it's my happyness.  It‘s been 4 years since I started online chinese teaching, I met many different Chinese leaners from all over the word, i'm outgoing and patient, just send me a meesage or book a trail lesson :)

I majored in Teaching Chinese as a Foreign Language. I worked in a Confucius Institute in Russia before, now I am a PhD student, live in Spain and. My native language is Chinese, and I  also speak Spanish, English and Russian. 
Mi especialidad universitaria es La enseñanza del chino como lengua extranjera. Antes trabajé en un Instituto Confucio en Rusia, Ahora soy un doctorado, vivo en España ya. Chino es mi idioma materna, y también hablo español, inglés y ruso. 
我的大学的专业是对外汉语，在孔子学院和私立中文学校工作过，有八年的中文教学经验。

大家好！我是闪。学习语言和教语言是我的爱好，同时我也喜欢旅游以及了解体验不同国家的风俗文化。现定居在沙特阿拉伯首都利雅得。
I'm Shan , a Mandarin teacher and I'm a native speaker .I'd like to teach languages and learning . Now I'm living in Riyadh with my family . Let's  improve your Chinese  *speaking*  skills while understanding Chinese culture!

Hi everyone! My name is Yiling. I majored in teaching Chinese as a second language at Guangzhou University. I love teaching Chinese and I have many experiences teaching Chinese to foreigners. I can speak fluently English and a little bit of Italian and Spanish.
